sources.name: United Nations World Tourism Organization (UNWTO)
sources.description:
Data source Our World In Data merged data presented by the United Nations World Tourism Organization (UNWTO) in the Tourism Barometer
Link e.g. http://www.example.org
Retrieved and produced 2017-April-24

The latest data was presented in the UNWTO Tourism Barometer, Volume 15 Advance Release January 2015
